column1: Yup! That, and what he’s proposing in policy to deal with coronavirus is opposite of every previous position of “Libertarianism”...he’s talking about monthly payments from government to displaced employees...that is SO FAR from libertarian I can’t imagine nobody notices.
Reckon he has already planted the seed. It'll be the coronavirus, with the media helping to whip up a frenzy as more countries are impacted
